accounts.title: Accounts
accounts.description: Select the account you want to use.

logout.title: Logout
logout.description: Click an account to end the session

set.title: Set Password
set.description: Set the password for your account
set.codeSent: A code has been sent to your email address.

required.newPassword: You have to provide a password!

change.title: Change Password
change.description: Set the password for your account

required.newPassword: You have to provide a new password!

idp.title: Sign in with SSO
idp.description: Select one of the following providers to sign in

linkingSuccess.title: Account linked
linkingSuccess.description: You have successfully linked your account!

loginError.title: Login failed
loginError.description: An error occurred while trying to login.

linkingError.title: Account linking failed
linkingError.description: An error occurred while trying to link your account.

completeRegister.title: Complete your data
completeRegister.description: You need to complete your registration by providing your email address and name.

verify.title: Verify your identity
verify.description: Choose one of the following factors.
verify.noResults: No second factors available to setup.

set.title: Set up 2-Factor
set.description: Choose one of the following second factors.

verify.title: Verify 2-Factor
verify.totpDescription: Enter the code from your authenticator app.
verify.smsDescription: Enter the code you received via SMS.
verify.emailDescription: Enter the code you received via email.

set.title: Set up 2-Factor
set.totpDescription: Scan the QR code with your authenticator app.
set.smsDescription: Enter your phone number to receive a code via SMS.
set.emailDescription: Enter your email address to receive a code via email.
set.totpRegisterDescription: Scan the QR Code or navigate to the URL manually.

verify.title: Authenticate with a passkey
verify.description: Your device will ask for your fingerprint, face, or screen lock

set.title: Setup a passkey
set.description: Your device will ask for your fingerprint, face, or screen lock

info.description: A passkey is an authentication method on a device like your fingerprint, Apple FaceID or similar.

verify.title: Verify 2-Factor
verify.description: Verify your account with your device.

set.title: Set up 2-Factor
set.description: Set up a device as a second factor.

disabled.title: Registration disabled
disabled.description: The registration is disabled. Please contact your administrator.

missingdata.title: Missing data
missingdata.description: Provide email, first and last name to register.

register.title: Register
register.noMethodAvailableWarning: No authentication method available. Please contact your administrator.
register.selectMethod: Select the method you would like to authenticate
register.agreeTo: To register you must agree to the terms and conditions

password.title: Set Password
password.description: Set the password for your account

required.password: You have to provide a password!

invite.title: Invite User
invite.description: Provide the email address and the name of the user you want to invite.
invite.info: The user will receive an email with further instructions.
invite.notAllowed: Your settings do not allow you to invite users.

success.title: User invited
success.description: The email has successfully been sent.
success.verified: The user has been invited and has already verified his email.
success.notVerifiedYet: The user has been invited. They will receive an email with further instructions.

error.title: Error
error.description: An error occurred while trying to sign in.

verify.successDescription: The user has been verified successfully.

verify.title: Verify user
verify.description: Enter the Code provided in the verification email.
verify.codeSent: A code has just been sent to your email address.

authenticator.title: Choose authentication method
authenticator.description: Select the method you would like to authenticate
authenticator.allSetup: You have already setup an authenticator!
authenticator.linkWithIDP: or link with an Identity Provider

usercode.title: Device code
usercode.description: Enter the code displayed on your app or device.

request.title: {appName} would like to connect
request.disclaimer: By clicking Allow, you allow {appName} and Zitadel to use your information in accordance with their respective terms of service and privacy policies. You can revoke this access at any time.

scope.offline_access: Allow offline access to your account.

error.unknownContext: Could not get the context of the user. Make sure to enter the username first or provide a loginName as searchParam.
error.sessionExpired: Your current session has expired. Please login again.
error.failedLoading: Failed to load data. Please try again.
